Title: Increases the dollar thresholds for the categories of larceny; repealer
Summary: Increases the dollar thresholds for the categories of larceny; provides for automatic adjustment of dollar thresholds for larceny offenses; removes carve outs for certain types of property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the dollar thresholds for the categories of larceny; and to repeal certain provisions of such law related thereto
